title: Vege Miasto
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Organic, Western, Buffet, Take-out, European, Polish
description: The owners opened this cafe and sweet shop in July 2014 at this location close to metro Ratusz Arsenal, and they also operates Vegavani catering; previously ran a cafe in Chmielna. Offers a wide range of vegan and gluten free food, including cakes and ice cream. Dishes change and range from burgers, pancakes, and tortilla to salads, spreads, pasta, and pizza.
